name: RI_1_1_4_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Attestation_Event
title: RI.1.1.4.1 Evidence of Record Entry Attestation Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Attestation Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Attestation Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.4.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence of Record Entry attestation (signature event).

statement.label: RI.1.1.4.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization where Record Entry content attestation (signature event) occurred.

statement.label: RI.1.1.4.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of attested Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.4.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the user attesting to Record Entry content (signature event).

statement.label: RI.1.1.4.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application in which Record Entry content attestation (signature event) occurred.

statement.label: RI.1.1.4.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., attestation/signature event).

statement.label: RI.1.1.4.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of Record Entry content attestation (signature event).

statement.label: RI.1.1.4.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entry content attestation (signature event) occurred.

statement.label: RI.1.1.4.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the data, document or other identifier for attested Record Entry content.
